GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with comments count

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object according to the article_id specified in the URL parameter

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for the given article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment for the given article_id

requestBody.inc_votes: number to increment the vote count

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: should delete a comment by the specified comment_id
